questionTitle: This car is ________ for us to buy. We are not that rich.
Put ________ money in your pocket!
I went to Madrid and stayed ________ friends.
I told them about it, but ________ listened .
I won't let you ________ there.
We live in Brighton, England . ________ house is on High Street.
________ walkman is yellow.
Why do you ________ pass you the map?
________ means has been considered .
Those interested in the post of Assistant Manager are requested to apply ________.
You can stay here ________ you don't make a loud noise.
The final ________ of the play will take place on Saturday.
Famine occurs when all the people in an area have hardly ________ food .
The disease ________ widely, all over the country.
When I see Barbara in the street, she always ________ at me.
We visited a college ________ in 1980.
Who should go to see him? I suggest that Mary ________ to see him.
We are too late. The plane ________ off ten minutes ago.
I can't help you, and he can't help you ________.
Your friends won't be here for long, ________?
